articles.title: Discussing Lions GM Brad Holmes' NFL Draft picks, and the mindset behind the moves - The Athletic
articles.description: Holmes showed again he isn't afraid to ignore positional value when he's ready to draft a player. And so far, his strategy is working.
articles.content: The Detroit Lions are where they are because of their process. Theyve taken a bit of an unconventional path to contention, but contenders are what they are because of how they navigate the NFL Draft.… [+9135 chars]
